title: Romantic Valentine’s Day single-page gift website (wine red/cream/gold) with editable sections

requirements.text: Create a single-page Valentine’s Day website with a warm, intimate, luxurious look using a deep wine red + soft creamy white palette with subtle gold accents, and apply the styling consistently across all sections.

quotes: The color palette should be deep wine red, soft creamy white, and subtle gold accents for elegance. The overall mood should feel warm, intimate, and luxurious.

acceptanceCriteria: All sections use the specified palette with consistent spacing, borders, and corner radius for a cohesive look.
Gold is used sparingly (e.g., dividers, icons, small highlights) and does not overpower the wine/cream base.

requirements.text: Implement the page structure with these sections in order: (1) Hero with title “To the Love of My Life” and a short romantic subtitle, (2) Love Letter editable area for a personal message, (3) Memories section with cards, (4) “Reasons I Love You” section with romantic text and/or icons (hearts/roses/stars), (5) Final closing section with a sweet Valentine’s message/quote that ends with the exact text “by vkayyy”.

quotes: A hero section with a heartfelt title like “To the Love of My Life” and a short romantic subtitle
A love letter section where I can write a personal message
A memories section with photos or cards showing special moments together ( i should be able to paste and copy)
A reasons I love you section with romantic text or icons (hearts, roses, stars)
A final section with a sweet Valentine’s message or quote it should end with "by vkayyy"

acceptanceCriteria: Hero displays the specified title text exactly: “To the Love of My Life”.
Final section’s last line ends with the exact substring: by vkayyy.
All five sections are present and visibly distinct.

requirements.text: Add elegant, romantic typography: use a script or serif font for headings and a clean, readable font for body text, including consistent heading hierarchy (H1/H2/H3) and comfortable line-height for long-form reading in the love letter.

quotes: Typography should be elegant and romantic (script or serif fonts for headings, clean fonts for body text).

acceptanceCriteria: Headings use a distinct script/serif style; body text uses a clean sans/legible font.
Long-form text (love letter) is readable on mobile and desktop (no overly small font sizes, adequate line-height).

requirements.text: Style the background so that sections alternate between creamy white and wine red, including soft gradients, subtle heart/rose pattern overlays, and rounded cards for content blocks (love letter, memory cards, reasons cards).

quotes: The background should alternate between creamy white sections and wine red sections, with soft gradients, subtle heart or rose patterns, and rounded cards.

acceptanceCriteria: Adjacent sections alternate between cream and wine backgrounds.
At least one subtle pattern overlay is visible on both a cream section and a wine section without harming text contrast.
Cards use rounded corners and consistent shadow/border treatment across sections.

requirements.text: Implement smooth, soft animations across the site: gentle fade-ins on section entry (e.g., on scroll into view), and subtle hover/focus transitions for interactive elements (buttons, cards, inputs).
acceptanceCriteria: Sections fade in as they enter the viewport (or on initial load for above-the-fold hero) with non-jarring durations/easing.
Buttons/cards/inputs have subtle hover/focus transitions (e.g., shadow/transform/color) consistent with the romantic theme.
Animations do not block interaction and do not cause noticeable layout shift.

requirements.text: Make the Love Letter section editable with an on-page text editor (e.g., textarea) and a styled preview area that renders the message in the site’s typography. Provide a one-click “Copy letter” control that copies the current letter text to the clipboard.

quotes: A love letter section where I can write a personal message

acceptanceCriteria: User can type and edit the love letter directly on the page.
A preview panel updates as the user types (or on save) and matches the site’s styling.
A copy action copies the full letter text to the clipboard and provides clear UI feedback (e.g., “Copied”).

requirements.text: Implement the Memories section as a grid of editable cards where the user can add/update content and easily paste/copy: allow adding a memory title + description, support pasting an image from the clipboard into a memory card (when the browser provides an image), and provide a “Copy” action per memory card to copy its text content (title + description).

quotes: A memories section with photos or cards showing special moments together ( i should be able to paste and copy)

acceptanceCriteria: User can add or edit at least a few memory cards (title + description) on-page.
Pasting an image into a memory card attaches/displays the image in that card (in browsers that support clipboard image paste).
Each memory card has a copy action that copies its textual content to the clipboard.

requirements.text: Create a “Reasons I Love You” section with romantic text items and decorative icons (hearts, roses, stars) styled in the site palette (including subtle gold accents), displayed as a responsive set of rounded cards or list items.

quotes: A reasons I love you section with romantic text or icons (hearts, roses, stars)

acceptanceCriteria: Section includes multiple reason items with either icon + text or icon-accented text.
Icons visually match the theme and do not look like default unstyled emojis (unless intentionally styled to fit).
Layout is responsive (e.g., 1 column on mobile, multi-column on larger screens).

requirements.text: Add required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI for subtle background pattern overlays and romantic decorative accents (without routing images through the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Pattern overlays are implemented using these assets and maintain readable contrast for text in each section.

constraints: Frontend must not modify any files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose existing UI components instead of editing them).
Do not add third-party authentication; only Internet Identity is allowed (not needed for this site).
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; avoid adding backend features unless required by the request.
nonGoals: User accounts, login, or personalization tied to identity.
Persisting the love letter/memories to the backend across devices (local, in-page editing is sufficient unless explicitly requested later).
Payments, messaging, email, or any real-time features.

required: Subtle seamless heart pattern overlay, wine-red on transparent (valentine-pattern-wine.dim_1600x1600.png)
Subtle seamless heart pattern overlay, creamy-white on transparent (valentine-pattern-cream.dim_1600x1600.png)
Minimal romantic icon set in subtle gold (heart, rose, star) on transparent (valentine-icons-gold.dim_512x512.png)
